subject: A Screenshot Of EVP Maker Settings, For thos interested in EVPM research
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hey Everybody,

I just posted at the bottom of the files section a screenshot of EVP 
maker. Showing the correct settings to use it with the Allaphone file
for Live communication sessions.

I will also post a screenshot of the sound soap settings I use.
They may vary from researcher to researcher.

The EVP maker settings must stay as they are to utilize the CUE that 
has been set up in the file.

Bruce
